problem.markdown:
>>Where are data pre-processing steps recorded in the Query Editor?<<
( ) In a separate .ps file (x) In the list of Applied Steps section ( ) In a separate .vbs script file ( ) In the Query Editor settings
[explanation] The pre-processing steps are recorded in the list of Applied Steps section in the Query Editor. [explanation]
problem.p: Where are data pre-processing steps recorded in the Query Editor?

choicegroup.label: Where are data pre-processing steps recorded in the Query Editor?
choicegroup.choice: In the list of Applied Steps section

div.p: The pre-processing steps are recorded in the list of Applied Steps section in the Query Editor.
